instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00426: What is 820-00426? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00426</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no video
threads.message:
Board turns on comes  caps lock working but no display
no LCD 5V
no backlight
no gpu core 
no gpu vram volt

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00426</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no video
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00426</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no video
threads.message:
Check diode mode to ground on all graphics power lines; compare with good board.
Just in case, you can try heat test on the GPU die.

Not sure if this board accepts disabling GPU in the same manner as 3332 and 3787; I never did that.
Try it, nothing to lose.
